config.en-US: Boot4shell provides a simple way to start an shell script at the startup of the WD Cloud. Have a look at the boot.sh in the app folder named boot4shell ;-)...
config.es-ES: Boot4shell provides a simple way to start an shell script at the startup of the WD Cloud. Have a look at the boot.sh in the app folder named boot4shell ;-)...
config.fr-FR: Boot4shell permet de démarrer, de façon simple, un ou plusieurs scripts shell au démarrage du cloud WD. Jettez un oeil au script boot.sh dans le dossier de l'application boot4shell ;-)...
